title: Gil Scott-Heron - The Revolution Begins The Flying Dutchman Mast
description:
Gil Scott-Heron - The Revolution Begins: The Flying Dutchman Masters (BGP-3CD-2012) FLAC 

The three albums, ''A New Black Poet''-''Pieces Of A Man''-''The Flying Dutchman'', Gil Scott-Heron recorded for Bob ThieleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Flying Dutchman label are some of the most important in the history of black music. ''The Revolution Begins'' gathers together every piece of music released by Gil on Flying Dutchman, including a track recorded with Bernard Ã¢â‚¬Å“PrettyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Purdie which has never been previously reissued.
